product_overview: Saree4Ever is a modern e-commerce platform specializing in traditional and designer Indian sarees. It features a black-and-white editorial theme to elegantly showcase product images, providing a seamless shopping experience through a full customer storefront and a powerful admin dashboard for complete product and inventory management.
core_goals: Provide customers with a beautiful, intuitive online store focused on sarees with detailed product variants and collections.
Enable efficient and secure inventory and order management to prevent overselling and ensure stock accuracy.
Implement a streamlined checkout process integrated with Razorpay payment gateway for seamless transactions.
Offer Amazon-style order tracking with real-time updates for customers.
Provide a robust admin dashboard for product, variant, inventory, offer management, and CSV bulk import/export capabilities.
Integrate AI-powered features including a chatbot and analytics for customer support and business insights.
Ensure fast performance with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Vercel deployment while maintaining security via JWT and Supabase authentication.
key_features: Editorial-themed frontend with black-and-white layout, full-color product imagery, and responsive design.
Customer-facing pages: Homepage with hero banners, collection and type listings, offer pages, detailed product pages with variant selectors (color, blouse options).
Robust shopping cart with localStorage persistence, product quantity management, and stock validation.
Secure checkout flow including shipping/billing forms and Razorpay payment integration.
Order tracking page showcasing Amazon-style status timeline and shipment details.
Admin dashboard with login protection, product and variant CRUD, collections, offers, inventory, order shipment management, and CSV bulk import.
Real-time stock reservation and adjustment to prevent overselling during checkout.
AI chatbot integration for customer recommendations and admin insights with secure backend endpoints.
Comprehensive search, filters, and sorting mechanisms on product listing pages.
Global layout with shared Header and Footer components ensuring consistent navigation and support.
user_flow_summary: User visits the homepage and browses collections or uses search and filters to find sarees.
User views product detail pages, selects variants (color, blouse), and adds items to the cart.
User reviews and updates the cart, then proceeds to checkout, entering shipping and billing information.
Upon confirming the order, stock is reserved and payment is processed via Razorpay integration.
On payment success, stock is committed, order status updates to 'Paid', and user can track order status via a timeline in their profile.
Admin logs into dashboard to manage products, inventory, orders, and imports product data via CSV files.
AI chatbot interacts with users and admins to provide recommendations and business insights in real time.
validation_criteria: All product variants display correct price, availability, and stock status on product detail pages.
Cart accurately reflects added items, persists across sessions via localStorage, and validates stock on quantity updates.
Checkout successfully integrates Razorpay payment flow, with backend stock reservation and confirmation on payment success or rollback on failure.
Order tracking timeline updates correctly reflecting status changes from pending to delivered.
Admin dashboard enforces secure JWT-authenticated access and allows full CRUD for products, variants, collections, offers, and orders.
CSV bulk import processes correctly importing products, variants, stock, and offers without data loss.
AI chatbot responds accurately based on product database and current stock/offers using a secure backend interface.
Frontend adheres to the editorial black-and-white theme with consistent UI components (Header, Footer) and ensures fast page loads deployed on Vercel.
